backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing authorization, child profiles, alarm events, biometric record storage, and guardian PIN logic with persistent state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading old actor state to include biometric record fields and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React application with root container and script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, theme provider, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Alarm/PinAcknowl: Form to verify guardian PIN and acknowledge an active alarm with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time guardian profile setup collecting a name and saving it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/AlarmEv: Displays alarm and access event history, fetching events and child profiles and rendering them with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Biometr: Manages biometric and touch-sensing records per child, allowing adding, viewing, and deleting records with dialogs and validation.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/ChildPr: Provides UI to create, rename, and archive child profiles, including dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Guardia: Allows guardians to set or update a PIN, validating input and submitting it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Guardian/Princip: Links or unlinks Internet Identity principals to child profiles, handling validation and displaying warnings.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, footer, authentication checks, and auto-redirect when an alarm is active.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarm.ts: Provides hooks to check alarm status and trigger or acknowledge alarms, with automatic query cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAlarmEvent: Fetches alarm event history from the backend using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBiometricR: Provides React Query hooks to fetch, add, and delete biometric records for a child, invalidating queries on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChildProfi: Defines hooks to retrieve, create, rename, and archive child profiles using the actor API with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Supplies hooks for reading and updating the caller’s user profile and role, including admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useGuardianPi: Offers mutation hooks for setting and verifying a guardian PIN via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePrincipalL: Contains hooks for linking and unlinking principals to child profiles and fetching the linked profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Alarm.tsx: Displays an alarm screen with audio signaling and a PIN acknowledgment form when a child access alarm is active.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the guardian dashboard with tabs for profiles, records, linking, logs, and settings, gated by user role.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page that handles authentication state, displays feature highlights, and allows guardians or linked children to trigger an alarm.
frontend/src/pages/LimitationsPrivacy.ts: Static page explaining web app limitations and privacy details related to manual triggers and guardian‑managed data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and implemented features.
